verses.roman:
āmā-duṅhāra mane tabe baḍa 'sukha' haya
eka nivedana yadi dhara, dayāmaya

synonyms: āmā-duṅhāra—of us two; mane—in the mind; tabe—therefore; baḍa—very much; sukha haya—there is happiness; eka nivedana—one request; yadi—if; dhara—You accept; dayā-maya—merciful.
translation: "If You will please accept just one request, we shall be very, very happy.
